column1: Baby Barnaby's////If you expect courteous service and to be able to get an item customized
column2: don't come here. On Saturday morning I went for breakfast and asked if ythe could do an omelet and NO WE DONT MAKE OMLETS WAS THE REPLY
column3: this is during breakfast and they have all the ingredients to make a cheese omelet.  I asked if I could get another breakfast dish with out one of the ingredients and NO IT IS PRE MIXED.  I guess Lil Barnabys only wants you to have it their way..... So I took the highway to Avalon dinner!
